Additional information: Bolívar belongs to the “LA COLMENA” group which has 9 members who all have different work and who will receive between $500 to $1500 each, depending on their seniority in the group. It is worth noting that their previous loans have been paid on time and surely will repeat this with this new loan.

loans.use: to buy tools, so that he can continue to support his family

loans.name: Independiente San Lorenzo Group

texts.es:
MADELINE: 
Desde los 10 años inicia esta tarea con el fin de ayudar a su madre y conseguir el pan de cada día. hoy Madeline es madre soltera de 2 niños varones de 6 y 4 años de edad y que asisten a la escuela normalmente; Madeline dice que se dedicó a esta tarea por la falta de oportunidad en un trabajo formal, solo estudió hasta el bachillerato y no encontró oportunidad en algún empleo formal.

Para la realización de esta tarea, ella se levanta todos los días a las 04H00 am. para dejar preparando el desayuno y el almuerzo para sus hijos que quedaran en casa solos hasta la tarde donde regresara de esta faena.
Al llegar a los adentros del manglar, es muy difícil la tarea, ya que para sacar 1 o 2 conchas, se debe introducir la mano en el lodo a una profundidad de 50 - 60 cm y al tacto lograr encontrar la concha, de no ser así, se busca otro lugar hasta encontrar el producto.
Muchas veces, nos encontramos con reptiles, y pejesapos, que al picar, produce fiebre, debilidad y según el reptil, puede producir la muerte.
los lugares de donde se saca la concha quedan a una hora y media desde San Lorenzo, mar a fuera. y los dueños de las embarcaciones, nos compran las 100 conchas en $8,00; para luego venderles a los intermediarios a un precio de $14,00 dice Madeline.  
Con este crédito, ella espera convertirse en intermediaria, ya que conoce lo que con sus compañeros sufren realizando esta tarea. Desea comprar a un precio más justo y poder crecer más en este negocio; así, podrá brindar una mejor alimentación a sus hijos y pasara más tiempo con ellos en casa.

INFORMACION ADICIONAL
Madeline se presenta levantando la mano en la fotografía, ella es líder del grupo de 8 personas quienes recibirán créditos de $400, $500 $1000 y $1200 según la antigüedad.
Cabe indicar que los créditos anteriores, fueron pagados de forma regular sin presentar novedades.
texts.en:
Madeline started this business when she was ten years old, in an effort to help her mother to put food on the table every day.  She is a single mother and has two sons, ages six and four who attend school.  Madeline says she decided on this line of work because there was no opportunity for a more formal job.  She only has a high school education and did not find any other work.

In order to do her work, she gets up every day at 4:00 a.m. to prepare breakfast and lunch for her children who stay home alone until she gets back from work.

Her work inside the swamp is very difficult since she must stick her hand down in the mud about 50 to 60 cm and feel her way around to find one or two molluscs.  If she does not find anything she must move on until she does.  Many times there are reptiles and toads that can bite and produce fever and weakness.  Depending on the type of reptile it can even cause death.  The swamp fishing area is an hour and a half from San Lorenzo, in the ocean, and the boat owners buy 100 molluscs for $8.00, then sell them to intermediaries at a price of $14.00, says Madeline.

With this loan, she wants to become an intermediary since she knows how much her colleagues suffer doing this work.  She wants to pay a just price and be able to expand in the business so she can feed her children better food and spend more time at home with them.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
Madeline is the one raising her hand up in the photograph.  She is the leader of the group of eight people who will receive loans of $400, $500, $1,000 and $1,200, depending on how long they have been in the group.

Their previous loans were repaid on a normal basis, with nothing further to mention.

loans.use: To buy molluscs and provide other mollusc collectors a fair wage

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase mobile devices , mobile accessories and renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Luis Edmundo

texts.es: En una ciudad de Ecuador vive Luis un hombre de 54 años de edad, él se dedica a la crianza de pollos en un corral que  construyo él mismo y también trabaja al jornal, Luis tiene dos hijos, el de 28 años ya es independiente y el de 27 años depende de su padre ya que sufre de una enfermedad que le impide caminar normalmente, don Luis es viudo y por este motivo tiene que luchar solo para salir adelante junto a su hijo, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos, la mayor aspiración de este señor es mejorar su negocio y ampliarlo para obtener los recursos  necesarios para cubrir los gastos de salud de su hijo, la alimentación de su hogar y en de ser posible quiere comprar una pequeña casa donde puedan vivir más tranquilos.
texts.en: Luis, 54 years old, lives in a city of Ecuador. He works raising chickens in a poultry pen that he himself built and he also works as a daily worker. Luis has two children: the 28 year old one is already independent and the 27 year old depends on his father since he suffers a disease that does not let him walk normally. Luis is a widower and therefore he has to struggle alone to move forward together with his son. He will invest the loan in buying chickens. His greatest desire is to improve his business and expand it in order to obtain the necessary resources to pay for his son's health expenses, food for his household, and if possible, he wants to buy a small house where they can live more peacefully.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchases construction materials.

loans.name: Maria Gladis

texts.es: Gladis es madre soltera, ella tiene 24 años de edad, Gladis vive con su hija  de 2 años a la que ama mucho y por la que lucha día a día; ella se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas y chanchos y también comenta que trabaja en el campo ya que lucha sola para sacar adelante a su hija porque el padre de su hija le apoya muy poco económicamente, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos, Gladis aspira  que su negocio se incremente y que mejoren sus ingreso para darle a su hija lo necesario en el estudio y alimentación.
texts.en:
Gladis is a single mother and is 24 years old.  She lives with her two-year-old daughter whom she loves very much and for whom she fights every day.  Gladis makes a living raising small animals like chickens and pigs, but says that she also works in the fields since she alone fights to get her daughter ahead in life because the girl's father supports her very little financially.

She is going to use the loan to invest in the purchase of pigs.  Gladis hopes that her business grows and her income improves so that she can give her daughter all she needs in school and nourishment.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy livestock in order to raise and resell them.

loans.name: Flor Alba

texts.es: Alba tiene su negocio que es un restaurante, ella tiene 36 años de edad y vive con su esposo y sus 6 hijos de 17, 15, 14, 10, 9 y 8 años mismos que se encuentran estudiando 3 asisten al colegio y 3 a la escuela, trabaja con esposo en este negocio desde hace un año el negocio es propio y comenta que la idea nació desde que Alba y su esposo trabajaban en un restaurante, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos para preparar y venderlos a sus clientes, la aspiración de  Alba es crecer mucho en su negocio para en lo pasible comprar una casa para mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos y que sigan estudiando.
texts.en:
Alba’s business is a restaurant.  She is 36 years old, and she lives with her husband and their six children.  The children are 17, 15, 14, 10, 9, and 8 years old, and they go to school.  Three go to high school, and three go to elementary school.  

She has been working with her husband in this business for one year.  The business is her own.  She said that the idea was born when Alba and her husband worked in a restaurant.

She will use the loan to buy products to prepare and sell to her customers.  Alba’s aspiration is to grow a lot in her business.  She wants to do this so that she can buy a house in order for her children to have a better quality of life and so that they can continue with their education.

loans.use: to buy food to prepare.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and to renovate her workplace.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
Gustavo es un estudiante destacado, esta estudiando la carrera de Derecho, y comenta que es su familia la que la inspira a poder seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo. Sus hijos y su esposa lo apoyan siempre en sus estudios.
Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en pagar las cuotas de su universidad, por lo que pudo seguir sus estudios. Hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar nuevamente sus cuotas y así seguir estudiando.
texts.en: Gustavo is an outstanding student, studying a career in law. He says that his family inspires him to be able to continue studying. His children and wife always support him in his studies. He says that his previous loan was used to pay university tuition so that he could continue his studies. Today he asks for a new loan to be able to invest in again paying his tuition and in this way continue studying.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Clara

texts.es:
Clara está  cursando la carrera de notariado, es abogada recibida, y está trabajando.
Tiene un hijo y comenta que vive con sus padres. Su familia es el sostén indispensable para lograr todos sus objetivos. Anhela llegar a ser jueza ya que le apasiona su trabajo.
Clara pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus cuotas, que le permitirá seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo, y de esa forma seguir luchando por sus sueños.
texts.en: Clara is studying to be a notary, she is a practicing lawyer and is working. She has a son and says that she lives with her parents. Her family is an indispensable support in order for her to achieve all her goals. She aspires to be a judge as she is passionate about her work. Clara asks for this loan to be able to invest in her tuition payments, which will permit her to continue studying as she has been, and in this way continue fighting for her dreams.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Melissa

texts.es:
Melissa vive en casa de sus padres, es hija única, está estudiando la carrera de Derecho, además está trabajando en una empresa.
Ella espera cumplir con sus sueños y poder ayudar a sus padres, para así poder retribuirles por el esfuerzo que han hecho ellos para ayudarle a estudiar. Espera algún día poder llegar a trabajar en su profesión.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad, lo que le permitirá seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de seguir luchando.
texts.en: Melissa lives in her parent's house. She is an only child, studying a career in law, in addition she works in a business. She hopes to complete her dreams and be able to help her parents, and in this way repay them for the support that they have provided her in helping her with her schooling. she hopes some day to be able to work in her profession. She asks for this loan in order to be able to pay her university tuition, which will permit her to continue studying as she has been. She is thankful for the opportunity that she is receiving to continue pursuing her dream.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her workshop by purchasing new tailoring tools and some fabric.

loans.name: María Floridalva

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Vida Nueva se reúne cada 15 días en el cantón Jaramijo, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, aquí la mayoría de los habitantes son muy trabajadores y dedicados a las faenas del mar. 
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 30 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 11 y 9 años y un bebé de meses, los mayores estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido es comerciante. 
Doña María y su marido se dedican al comercio, ellos tienen dos locales, uno en Jaramijo en el cual iniciaron hace más de tres años y otro en el barrio Cuba en la ciudad de Manta, allí venden artículos de plásticos y cosas para fiestas ya sea infantiles o de cualquier tipo ( piñatas, adornos, juguetes, entre otras cosas), mientras ella y su esposo venden en Manta su papá les ayuda con el local que tienen en esta ciudad, ella por su parte además de ayudar con las ventas también realiza manualidades que venden en su local, ella fabrica carameleras, canastas, piñatas y varios objetos que se utilizan de adornos en dichas fiestas.
Este crédito es para comprar juguetes, artículos de plásticos y materiales para elaborar las manualidades. Lleva 2 años en el  Grupo de Crédito  y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan en su negocio. Sus sueños son tener sus propios locales ya que arriendan donde tienen sus negocios.
texts.en:
The Nueva Vida Credit Group meets every 15 days in the Jaramijo Canton, a place that is known for its beautiful beaches. Here, most of the people are very hard working fishermen. Señora María lives in this place. She is 30 years old, and she has a common law marriage from which she has three children. Two are ages 11 and 19, and one is a baby who is months old. The older ones are studying in high school and grade school. Her husband is a businessman.

Doña María and her husband work in sales, and they have two stores: one in Jaramijo in which they started out more than three years ago, and the other is in the Cuba neighborhood in the city of Manta. They sell plastic items and party supplies for children’s parties or any type of celebration (piñatas, decorations, toys, and similar items).  Her father helps them when they are working in their store in the city of Manta, and for her part, in addition to helping with sales, she makes hand crafted items that they sell in their store. She makes candy jars, baskets, piñatas, and various decorative items for parties.

This loan is for purchasing toys, plastic items, and materials for making the handicrafts. She has been in the credit group for two years, and she likes it because the loans help her in her business. Her dream is to have their own properties, as they are renting their stores.

loans.use: to purchase toys, plastic items, and materials for handicrafts.

loans.name: Bayan

texts.en: Bayan is 22 years old. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Salt with her two siblings and her parents. She is a university student majoring in programming and she is in her third year. Bayan is planning to work in her study field after graduation to support her family, but she doesn't have enough money to pay for her upcoming semester fees. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy livestock in order to raise and resell them in the local markets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy livestock to raise.

loans.name: Al-Rwa Group

texts.en: Al-Rwa is a group consisting of four women from Sana'a, Yemen. They have applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB. Janya is the leader of the group. She is a 32-year-old married woman with four children; they all live together in one house. She is an uneducated woman, but she is very active and dynamic. Janya works as a housewife. She has a lot of work to do inside of the house because she wants to improve her family's living standards. In the past, Janya has purchased many appliances for the house. Recently, she doesn't have enough money to complete the furnishing of the house. Therefore, she is requesting a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase a refrigerator for the house. In the future, Janya hopes to renovate her own house and complete furnishing it. Her dreams are to open a business and to earn her family a lot of money.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator for the house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy livestock to raise and resell in the local markets

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en:
Nadia is a conservative woman. So she asked her son to take her place in the picture. Nadia was born in in 1971. Her husband is a retired man.

Nadia's son is a university student majoring in Business Administration. He is in his second year, and he is planning to work in his study field after graduation in order to support his family financially. 

But Nadia doesn't have enough money to pay for her son's upcoming semester fees. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her son's upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his son’s education.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for a more efficient cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient cooking gas from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more electrical products and to renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase wood

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient and clean cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Mirna

texts.es:
Mirna es soltera, vive con sus padres, ella trabaja como limpiadora por las mañanas y a la tarde en su casa se dedica a la elaboración de artesanías
Está en el segundo año en Ciencias de la Educación,  sus estudio es para que pueda progresar y salir  adelante. Ella aspira  ser una profesional. Y quiere ser una persona  útil  para la  sociedad.  
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, como así también poder cubrir sus gastos de transporte. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
Mirna is single and lives with her parents. She works as a cleaner in the mornings and in the afternoon she is at home making handicrafts. She is in her second year of studying Education. She is studying so that she can progress and get ahead. She wants to become a professional and be useful to her society..

Mirna is requesting a loan to pay her university fees and to also cover her transportation expenses. She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving.

loans.use: to pay university fees and pay her transportation expenses.

loans.name: Deyma

texts.es:
Deyma está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería comercial, donde de aquí a un tiempo se ve ejerciendo su profesión y ayudando a las personas que necesiten de sus conocimientos.
Es una estudiante muy dedicada, que gracias a su esfuerzo y lucha está saliendo adelante. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, y con ello seguir luchando por sus sueños como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Deyma is studying for a degree in commercial engineering, so that some time from now she will be practicing her profession and helping people that need her expertise.  She is a very dedicated student, and thanks to her efforts and struggles, she is getting ahead.  She is requesting this loan to be able to pay the university fees, and with that, continue striving for her dreams as she is doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es:
Magdalena ingreso a la carrera de medicina veterinaria para poder trabajar en el campo e incrementar la productividad en los ganados y así ayudar a su familia a salir adelante.
Su sueño y anhelo es ser una profesional útil a las demás personas, y así poder aportar un poco a la sociedad. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus clases de la universidad, que le hará mucha falta y que le permitirá seguir estudiando.
texts.en: Magdalena enrolled to study veterinary medicine in order to be able to work in the countryside and increase productivity of cattle and in this way help her family get ahead. Her dream and goal is to be a professional useful to other people, and in this way be able to support society. She asks for this loan to be able to invest in paying for her university classes, as she needs the funds in order to enable her to continue studying.

loans.use: to pay for university classes.

loans.name: Rafaella

texts.es:
Rafaella es una estudiante muy luchadora, que se esta destacando en sus estudios, comenta que quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas por medio de sus conocimientos, y que quiere ser una profesional destacada que sea util, no solo a si misma, sino también a los demás.
Comenta que su anterior préstamo lo uso para poder invertirlo en pagar sus clases y cubrir otros gastos. Hoy pide de nuevo este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, que le permitirá seguir estudiando. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en: Rafaella is a hard-working, outstanding student. She says that she wants to be able to help other people through her knowledge, and that she wants to be an outstanding professional that is useful, not only for herself, but also for others. She says that her previous loan was used to pay for her classes and cover other costs. Today she asks for a new loan to be able to pay her university tuition, which will permit her to continue studying. She is thankful for this new opportunity that she is receiving.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Esraa

texts.en: Esraa is 22 years old. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Salt with her parents. She is a university student majoring in accounting. Esraa is planning to work in her study field after graduation to support her family, but she doesn't have enough money to pay for her upcoming semester fees. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Rimas** Group

texts.en: Rimas** is a group consisting of four women who live in Sana'a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 180,000 YER from AL-Amal Microfinance Bank (AMB). Abla is a 52- year-old married woman with seven children. The oldest child is 20 years old and the youngest one is seven years old. Abla is the leader of the group. Despite miserable conditions, she didn't surrender, instead she decided to help her husband with the family's expenses. Abla started up her tailoring business seven years ago. She started by tailoring children's clothes who lived in her area with a small amount of capital. Recently, she has earned a good income, but unfortunately most of what she earns goes to  pay for the children's expenses. She is working hard to improve her business, but she lacks the materials. For this reason, she has applied for a 50.000 YER loan from AMB in order to purchase more tailoring materials, such as fabric, zippers, buttons, and many spools of thread. Abla looks forward to continuing her business and increasing her capital. She hopes to provide for her family with a lot of income.

loans.use: to purchase more tailoring materials.

loans.name: Erick Ivan

texts.es: Es un joven emprendedor, tiene 27 años de edad, casado, tiene un pequeño hijo de un año de edad. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos, desde hace 2 años estableció su pequeño negocio de barbería. Con las ganancias percibidas le han permitido comprar un exhibidor de gaseosas, jugos ya gua purificada para ofrecerlos a sus clientes, también apoya a su hermano en sus estudios, al contratarlo como ayudante por medio tiempo, por un salario aproximado de C$ 2,500, debido a que en el turno vespertino estudia su secundaria. Su esposa trabaja como ayudanta en una tienda de ropa. Solicita su segundo financiamiento para comprar en Managua 2 sillas giratorias de barbería que se acondicionan a la altura de sus clientes. Con el primer financiamiento otorgado por Pana Pana, le permitieron terminar de construir el pequeño local de concreto de su barbería. Su sueño es tener un centro de defensa personal.
texts.en: Erick Ivan is a young, 27 year old entrepreneur, and married with a small one year old son.  With the purpose of having his own source of income, he established his small barber shop two years ago.  The profits he has received have allowed him to purchase a display case for soft drinks, juice, and purified water to offer his customers.  Also, he supports his brother in his studies. He has hired him as a part-time assistant, and pays him about about C$ 2,500.  During the evening shift, he works on his high school studies.  His wife works as an assistant in a clothing shop.  He is requesting his second loan to purchase two swivel barber chairs in Managua, which may be adjusted to the customer’s height. The first loan granted through Pana Pana allowed him to build the small concrete local of his barber shop.  His dream is to have his own self-defense center.

loans.use: to purchase two swivel barber chairs in Managua, which may be adjusted to the customer’s height.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more goods and renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Eleonora Rafaela

texts.es:
Los deseos de superación, el entusiasmo por ayudar a los demás y muchos proyectos de vida llenos de fuerza y energía, recorren por la sangre de Eleonora de 31 años, madre de tres hijos, esposa, comerciante y técnica auxiliar. Mientras se dedicaba a formar  a sus hijos, decidió sacar una carrera técnica como auxiliar, sin embargo, ahora quiere su título como licenciada en enfermería, pues no se rinde para terminar su carrera.
Actualmente despierta todos los sábados  muy de mañana hace tres años para culminar el Técnico superior en enfermería de la Universidad Nacional Autónoma de Nicaragua. Su madre, su esposo y su cuñada, han servido de apoyo durante los primeros años de su carrera, además la tienda de ropa usada que ha logrado establecer desde hace un año, ha servido parcialmente en sus gastos universitarios. No obstante, ahora iniciará con sus prácticas clínicas en un hospital materno, de manera que necesita el préstamo para comprar útiles didácticos para sus prácticas profesionales y herramientas de trabajo para la universidad, como sus libros. Su meta es terminar la carrera, poder ejercer en su carrera como enfermera y seguir adelante con su tienda, la cual sirve para mejorar las condiciones de vida de ella y de su familia.
texts.en:
The desire to improve, the enthusiasm to help others and many life projects full of force and energy run through the veins of Elanora. She is 31 years old, married, a mother of 3 children, a business person and a technical assistant. While she was busy bringing up her children she decided to obtain a technical diploma as an assistant. However she now wants to get her degree as a Licensed Nurse as she's not going to give up on her education.

For the last 3 years she gas been getting up very early on Saturday mornings to attend her Superior Nursing course at the Universidad Nacional Autónoma de Nicaragua. Her mother, her spouse and her mother-in-law have been a support for her during the first years of her training. Also the secondhand clothing store she established a year ago helps pay part of her university expenses.

However now that she is starting her clinical practicum in a maternity hospital, she needs a loan to buy the education supplies for her professional practice and the working tools for the university, like her books. Her goal is to finish her training and be able to exercise her profession and continue with her store. This will help improve the living conditions of her family and herself.

loans.use: to buy teaching supplies for her profession and work tools.

loans.name: Gaston

texts.es:
Gaston está estudiando la carrera de derecho, comenta que quiere ser un abogado destacado y reconocido en el ámbito jurídico.
Él se está esforzando bastante en pos de su ideal, es por ello que está estudiando bastante. Comenta que su familia lo inspira, y que por ellos también está luchando.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación, y también poder seguir sus sueños y metas.
texts.en: Gaston is studying a law career. He says he wants to be an outstanding lawyer and well-known in the legal field. He is confident in his ideals, and therefore he is studying hard. He says that his family inspires him, and it is also because of them that he fights hard to be successful. He asks for this loan in order to cover his certification costs and also to be able to follow his dreams and goals.

loans.use: to pay certification expenses.

loans.name: Irene Mercedes

texts.es:
Arroz, frijoles, condimentos, jugos y agua, son algunos de los productos que se pueden ver al entrar a la pulpería de Irene, quien siempre atiende a sus clientes con una gran sonrisa y buena disposición. Tiene 36 años de edad y está casada. Es una mujer carismática y emprendedora, hace cuatro años abrió su negocio con deseos de superarse y lograr estabilidad económica, poco a poco su meta se va realizando. Su mano derecha es su esposo, quien siempre le brinda su apoyo incondicional.
Solicita el financiamiento para aumentar el capital de su trabajo, necesita comprar productos básicos, como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, queso entre otros productos; al mismo tiempo productos de limpieza. Deposita su confianza en el préstamo que ofrece Kiva y MiCrédito, puesto que le ayudaran a incrementar la producción de su negocio, de igual manera su clientela, quienes son un factor importante para la obtención de ingresos. Uno de sus sueños es convertir su pulpería en una miscelánea.
texts.en:
Rice, beans, spices, juice, and water are some of the products that can be seen upon entering Irene’s grocery store.  Irene is always serving her customers with a big smile and a good nature.  She is a 36 years old, married woman who is charismatic and enterprising.  Four years ago, she opened her business with a desire to succeed and attain financial stability.  Gradually, she realized her goal.  Her right hand is her husband, who always offers his unconditional support.  

She is requesting this loan to increase working capital, and needs to purchase basic products such as rice, beans, sugar, cheese, and other items, as well as cleaning supplies.  She places her confidence in the loan that Kiva y MiCrédito provide since they will help her increase her business’s production as well as her customers, who are an important factor for obtaining income.  One of her dreams is to convert her grocery store into a small general store.

loans.use: to purchase basic products such as rice, beans, sugar, cheese, and other items, as well as cleaning supplies

loans.name: Daysi Del Carmen

texts.es:
En 1990 una mujer llamada Daysi de 30 años de edad, decidió emigrar a Matagalpa en búsqueda de una mejor vida. Sin mucho capital de por medio,  emprendió con un tramo improvisado en el parque municipal, donde comercializaría inmediatamente refrescos naturales, arroz con leche y nacatamales. Poco a poco fue obteniendo ingresos que luego le permitieron cumplir su visión como comerciante de comida completa. Desafortunadamente, para esta madre soltera esto no fue suficiente para ofrecerle la vida que desea a su hijo, de manera que le tocó tomar la difícil decisión de mandarlo a vivir con sus familiares en Guatemala.
Actualmente, la alcaldía la ha apoyado con la mejora de su local, proveyéndole una infraestructura metálica que le permitiera tener mejor seguridad en su negocio. Sin embargo, necesita del préstamo para comprar arroz, pollo, carne, frijoles, frutas, entre otros productos básicos para aumentar y mejorar su venta. En un futuro desea comercializar en distintos parques y con mayor flujo, lo que le permitirá cumplir su meta de embaldosar su casa.
texts.en:
In 1990, a 30-year-old woman named Daysi decided to emigrate to Matagalpa in search of a better life. Not having a lot of money, she set up an improvised section in the municipal park, where she would immediately sell natural beverages, rice pudding and nacatamales (Nicaraguan-style tamales). Little by little, she earned income that later allowed her to achieve her vision of being a food merchant. Unfortunately, for this single mother, that was not enough to offer the life that she wants to her son, so Daysi made the difficult decision to send him to live with relatives in Guatemala.

Now, the mayoralty has helped her with the improvement of her business, providing her a metal infrastructure that has allowed her to have greater security in her business. Nevertheless, she needs this loan to buy rice, chicken, meat, beans, fruits, and other basic products to increase and improve her sales. In the future, she wants to sell in other parks and with greater flow, which will allow her to achieve her goal of putting tile in her house.

loans.use: to buy rice, chicken, meat, beans, fruits, and other basic products.

loans.name: Kelia Liseth

texts.es: Es una joven comerciante de 27 años de edad, casada, con un hijo de 6 años de edad, que estudia su primer grado de primaria. Es originaria de Estelí, que llegó a Rosita desde hace 24 años con sus padres y se estableció en este lugar. Su esposo trabaja en una institución del gobierno municipal. Desde hace aproximadamente 5 años inició su propio negocio de ropa nueva, perfumes y cosméticos por catálogos, los cuales los vende por encargos. Solicita su segundo financiamiento para comprar mercadería: Una docena de pantalones para mujeres, 2 docenas de blusas, media docena de trajes para niñas, perfumes. La mercadería la compra en Managua para venderla a precios accesibles en Rosita. Su sueño es tener su propia tienda en un punto estratégico, que le permita ofertar sus productos.
texts.en: She is a young retailer, 27 years old, married, with a 6 year old son that is in first grade of elementary school. She is originally from Esteli, she arrived to Rosita 24 years ago with her parents and got established here. Her husband works at a municipal government institution. Approximately 5 years ago she started her own business selling new clothing, perfumes and cosmetics through catalog, which she sells by personal order.  She is requesting a second loan to buy merchandise: a dozen ladies' pants, 2 dozen blouses, half a dozen girl outfits, perfumes. She buys the merchandise in Managua to sell it at affordable prices in Rosita. Her dream is to have her own store in a strategic location that allows her to offer her products.

loans.use: to buy merchandise: a dozen ladies' pants, 2 dozen blouses, half a dozen girl outfits, perfumes.

loans.name: Hala

texts.en:
Hala, 22, is married and lives in Irbed, a sector in Jordan. In her second year at university she is studying to get a degree in Business Administration.

Hala is planning to work in her field of study after graduation so she can help support her husband. She doesn't have enough money, however, to pay for her upcoming semester’s tuition. For this reason she is applying for a 525 JOD loan through National Microfinance Bank to pay them.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester's tuition

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient and reliable Liquefied Petroleum Gas as a kitchen cooking energy

loans.name: San Rafael Group

texts.es:
Este grupo llamado San Rafael es de la ciudad de Asunción, ellas son mujeres muy unidas y sacrificadas que con trabajo y lucha han ido creciendo. Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Gladys, quien se dedica a venta de comidas variadas que ella misma hace y que después sale a vender de manera ambulante.
Gladys es una mujer muy sacrificada que todos los días trabaja desde muy tempranas horas para poder hacer las comidas que vende. Su sueño es poder tener un negocio fijo donde ofrecer sus comidas.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos varios para seguir haciendo sus comidas, como ser: carne, verduras, condimentos, y demás. Ella lucha por su familia y por sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
This group named San Rafael is from the city of Asunción. They are a very unified and self-sacrificing group of women who have succeeded in getting ahead through much work and struggle. One of the members is Gladys, who makes a living selling a variety of foods which she prepares herself and later sells as a street vendor.

Gladys is a very self-sacrificing woman who works every day from the earliest hours in order to prepare the foods that she sells. Her dream is to have a business in a fixed location where she can offer her meals.

She is requesting this loan to be able to buy diverse supplies to continue making her foods, such as: meat, vegetables, condiments, and other ingredients. She fights for her family and for her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, condiments and other ingredients to prepare food for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for a clean cooking energy package stove from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for clean cooking fuel from Liquefied Petroleum Gas.

loans.name: Doris Elizabeth

texts.es:
El estudio es la oportunidad de entrar al bello y maravilloso mundo del saber, es lo que día a día Doris trata de transmitir a sus estudiantes. Tiene 30 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos. Es Licenciada en Ciencias Naturales, imparte clases desde hace diez años. Es una mujer inteligente y emprendedora,  le apasiona su carrera porque estudia el cuerpo humano y la naturaleza. Junto a su esposo luchan por el bienestar y futuro de sus hijos. 
Ella solicita el financiamiento para pagar el titulo de Licenciada en Ciencias Naturales, la mala situación económica se lo ha dificultado. Doris deposita plenamente su fe en el préstamo que ofrece Kiva y MiCrédito, el que le brindara la oportunidad de ser mejor pagada y al mismo tiempo obtener mejores oportunidades laborales. En sus planes futuros, está en realizar una maestría, obtener plaza de tiempo completo en el colegio que labora y mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Study is the opportunity to enter into the beautiful and wondrous world of knowledge. This is what Doris tries to convey to her students every day. She is 30 years old, she is married, and she has two children. 

She has a degree in Natural Sciences, and she has been teaching for ten years. She is an intelligent and enterprising woman who is passionate about her field because she studies the human body and nature. Together, she and her husband fight for the well-being of their children.

She is seeking financing in order to pay for a graduate degree in Natural Sciences; the bad economy has made it difficult, and Doris has placed all of her faith in the loan that Kiva is offering, and in MiCredito, which will afford her the possibility to be better paid, and at the same time, obtain better employment opportunities.

Her future plans include pursuing her Master’s degree, achieving full-time status at the high school in which she works, and improving her children’s living conditions

loans.use: to pay for a graduate degree in Natural Sciences.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient fuel from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a clean-cooking liquefied petroleum gas package.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a small tent and expand his fruit and vegetable sales business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a clean and efficient cooking fuel package that uses liquefied petroleum gas.

loans.name: Sedqeya

texts.en: Sedqeya was born in 1973. She is married and has three daughters. She has been working at selling clothes that she gets from the free-zone market at wholesale prices for three years. She started her project at home. Then she expanded her project by opening her own clothes store. One of the obstacles that she is facing is lack of transportation. Now she is asking for a loan to purchase a new collection of summer clothes that are requested by customers in order to raise her sales and get a good income to help her husband in covering their daughter's needs.

loans.use: to purchase a new collection of clothes to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for affordable and efficient cooking fuel from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient cooking fuel using Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for clean and efficient cooking fuel using Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Irenita

texts.en:
Irenita is 40 years old and has four children. She is married and two of her children are in school.

She and her family survived Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. 

Irenita is taking out a housing loan of PHP 6,300 to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. 

She plans to recover through her buying and selling of fish business.

With your help, Irenita can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of Super Typhoon Haiyan. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business and help her husband financially.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary was born in 1985. She is married and lives in a sector in Jordan called Dair Alla. Her husband is a government employee. 

Mary has been working at raising livestock and selling them in the past. But she found out that selling clothes and blankets is a more profitable business. So she started selling them one year ago. Now she is seeking a youth loan to purchase more blankets and clothes that her customers requested in order to raise her income.

loans.use: To buy more clothes and blankets for her business

loans.name: Jenneth

texts.en:
Jenneth is 31 years old and married with three children, two of whom are in school, Jenneth works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Jenneth has been in this business for five years.

In the future, Jenneth would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a flour mixer and more flour

loans.name: Basma

texts.en: Basma was born in 1960. She is a married woman and a mother of six. Her husband is a retired man. Basma has been supporting her husband by selling clothes at her house for one year. She got this idea from one of her neighbors and found it profitable and a good way to cover her children's needs. Now she is planning to expand her business by purchasing a larger collection of clothes. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for the most efficient and reliable clean cooking fuel using Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for the most efficient cooking fuel using Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru: Светлана работает на швейной фабрике, которую основал один итальянец. Работает давно, но зарабатывает не так много, хватает, в основном, на главные бытовые нужды. Светлана давно планировала поменять окна в своем доме, на что никак не могла выделить средства, так как дополнительно не было соответствующей суммы. Дом, в котором живет Светлана с мужем и двумя детьми, - добротный, из кирпича. Поддерживается в надлежащем порядке, все побелено и аккуратно. Вот только окна старого образца, из-за чего пропускают холод зимой, тепло уходит и приходится тратить больше на энергоносители и газ, чтобы обогреть помещение в холодную погоду. Чтобы экономить на счетах за газ, которым семья обогревает дом зимой и осенью, они решили поменять все окна в доме. Для замены окон нужна сумма в 8 000 гривен.
texts.en: Svetlana works in a clothing factory originally founded by an Italian national.   She has been working for a long time and does not make a lot of money, but she has enough, in general, to meet her daily needs.  Svetlana has long been thinking about changing the windows of her house, but she never had the means to do it for lack of sufficient funds.  The house in which she lives with her ​​husband and two children is a good-quality house, made of bricks.  It is in very good condition, whitewashed and meticulously kept.  Old-fashioned windows are the only problem: they let the cold air in during the winter, and heat is lost.  As a consequence, Svetlana has to spend more than necessary on energy and gas bills in order to keep the house warm.  In order to spend less on gas, which the family uses to heat the house in the fall and winter, they have decided to change all the windows in the house, and for this, they need 8,000 hryvnia.

loans.use: to install new plastic windows to keep her house warm.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith works hard to support her family. Judith is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional fish to sell.

Judith has been in this business for five years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fish to sell

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita, 37, is married and has three children, all of whom are in school. For the past two years she has worked hard selling frozen foods in the Philippines.

Anita is applying for a 20,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more frozen food inventory to sell. She is working hard to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more frozen food inventory to sell.

loans.name: Carlita

texts.en:
Carlita is 58 years old and married with three children, one of whom is in school. Carlita works very hard to provide for them.

Carlita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 28,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for twenty-five years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future, Carlita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Salwa

texts.en: Salwa is a 46-year-old widow who was left with her two sons to take care of. One of her sons is a deaf-mute. Salwa has been trying her best to support her two sons and to cover their needs by sewing clothes at home as this was the only source of income for them. Now Salwa wants to expand her project in order to raise her profit so that she will improve their standard of living. She is currently seeking a loan to buy a new sewing machine which will raise her productivity.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy the needed tools for her husband's barbershop

loans.name: Najla

texts.en: Najla is a conservative lady so she asked her husband to take her place in the picture. Najla was born in 1978. She has been trying to support her husband by practicing a hobby and turning it into a business to help improve their standards. Najla has been making artificial trees at her house and selling them for seven years. She is now planning to expand her business to increase her profit by purchasing new materials that will help her make a new collection. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To purchase more materials for her business

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 49 years old, married with five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Jocelyn's house was destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines on November 8, 2013. She has restarted her general store business and is committed to regain what she lost. Jocelyn is taking out a PHP 7,060 housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family.

Jocelyn has been with NWTF for three years in her pursuit to rise out of poverty. With your help, she will be able to start once more in a new home. In the future, Jocelyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Noora

texts.en:
Noora was born in 1983. She is married and has three children. Her husband works in construction. 

Noora has been selling clothes for one year, after her experience in selling underwear. This has been profitable work for her. Noora is asking for a youth loan to buy new merchandise to sell so that she can get better income and cover her children's needs.

loans.use: to buy new merchandise.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima was born in 1960. She is a widow who was left to take care of her three sons. 

She has been running her mini-market for one year, through which she supports her sons. 

Fatima has applied for this loan to bring more products into the store

loans.use: to bring in more products for her mini-market.

loans.name: Amneh

texts.en:
Amneh was born in 1957. She owns a mini-market in a room at her house, through which she supports the family. 

Now she has applied for this loan to help her husband bring more products into the store so that she will support her family more by raising her profit.

loans.use: to bring in more products for her mini-market.

loans.name: Vasiliy

texts.ru:
Василий живет в городке Хуст, Закарпатская область. Он занимается реализацией сухофруктов, овощей и фруктов уже 2 года. Торговое место Василий арендует на местном рынке. В работе использует и свой собственный автомобиль, на котором легче работать и ездить на закупку овощей и фруктов. 
Для приобретения очередной партии товара Василию нужна сумма в 5 000 гривен. На эти дополнительные средства он планирует закупить мандарины, яблоки, огурцы, ананасы и сушеные фрукты для дальнейшей реализации. Со временем Василий мечтает достроить собственный дом и открыть дома магазинчик по продаже овощей и фруктов, продолжая развивать свое дело, за счет которого, собственно говоря, живет вся его семья — жена и двое дочерей 7-ми и 4-х лет.
texts.en:
Vasiliy lives in the city of Khoost in the Transcarpathia province of southwestern Ukraine.  He has been selling dried fruits, vegetables and fresh fruits for two years.  He rents a retail space at a local market.  He works using his own car, which makes his job easier when it comes to driving around to buy fruits and vegetables.

In order to buy more merchandise, Vasiliy needs 5,000 hryvnia.  He plans to use this sum of money to buy tangerines, apples, cucumbers, pineapples and dried fruits.  He dreams of building his own house one day and to open a small store inside his house, where he would sell fruits and vegetables.  In the meantime, he wants to continue to develop his business thanks to which, as a matter of fact, he is able to support his entire family (his wife and his two daughters, ages 7 and 4).

loans.use: to purchase tangerines, apples, cucumbers, pineapples and dried fruit for sale.

loans.name: Nelly Martina

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Grupo de Crédito Mujeres Por EL Progreso.
En este lugar vive la señora Nelly, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive en su casa. Su esposo es mecánico.
Doña Nelly es una gran madre y esposa que realiza el crédito para ayudarle a su marido en su trabajo, el tiene un taller de mecánica automotriz donde realiza arreglos a todo tipo de carros, ahí trabaja junto a uno de sus hijos y operarios cuando tiene mucho trabajo por entregar, trabaja de lunes a sábado, el también en su taller vende líquidos de frenos, latas, pinturas, aceites y otras refacciones necesarias para realizar sus trabajos,  lleva más de 20 años con su taller con el cual saca adelante a su familia. 
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar pinturas, latas, aceites, líquidos de frenos entre otras cosas que necesita en su taller. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde el inicio y le gusta porque con los créditos le ayuda a su marido.  Sus sueños son seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The members of Mujeres por el Progreso Communal Bank meet every two weeks in Los Bajos de Montecristi, a town known for its great variety of traditional products, such as the straw hats made from toquilla palm leaves that are famous throughout the country and abroad.

This is where Nelly lives.  She's 52 years old and married, and has three adult children from this relationship.  One of them still lives at home.  Her husband's a mechanic.

Nelly's an excellent mother and wife who's getting the loan to help her husband in his job.  He has an auto repair shop where he fixes all types of cars.  He works there with one of his children and and, when he has a lot of work, employees.  He works from Monday through Saturday.  He also sells brake fluid, cans, paint, oil, and other parts necessary for his work.  He has had his shop for more than 20 years and he gets his family ahead with his business.

She's going to use this loan to buy paint, cans, oil, brake fluid, and other things for the shop.

Nelly has been with the communal bank since the beginning and she likes it because she helps her husband with the loans.  Her dream is to keep making progress.

loans.use: to buy paint, cans, oil, brake fluid, etc.

loans.name: Noufa

texts.en:
Noufa, 56, is married and a mother of six sons and daughters. Her husband is a retired private sector employee.

To supplement her husband’s retirement salary, Noufa started to make yogurt and cheese, especially jameed, a dried yogurt product shaped into a ball and often referred to as "rock cheese." It is a key ingredient in mansaf, a traditional Jordanian lamb dish.

Noufa is applying for a 423 JOD loan through National Microfinance Bank to buy more sheep and milk in order to be more productive and raise her profits.

loans.use: to buy more sheep and milk

loans.name: Brett

texts.en:
Brett, 25, is married and has four children, one of whom is in school. For the past eight years she has sold flowers in the Philippines.

Brett is applying for a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy an assortment of flowers to sell. She is working hard to ensure the financial stability of her family now and in the future.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of flowers to sell.

loans.name: Manal

texts.en:
Manal is a conservative woman, so she asked her husband to take her place in the picture. 

Manal was born in 1975. She is a mother of four daughters and two sons. Her husband is a retired man who currently works as a bus driver. Manal has been running her mini-market for two years, trying to support her family financially. 

She is now seeking a loan to expand her mini-market by purchasing a larger quantity of food products so that she will raise her profit. But, she doesn't have enough money to do so. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to stock her mini-market with new food products.

loans.name: Shadya

texts.en:
Shadya is a 22-year-old lady. She is married and has two sons. Her husband is serving in the military, through which he supports the family. 

Shadya has applied for this youth loan to support her husband financially by expanding her business of houseware sales by purchasing more home products.

loans.use: to bring in more home products for her business.

loans.name: Sergei

texts.ru:
Сергей занимается установкой и продажей систем электрического отопления. Живет и работает в Дрогобыче и области. В этом бизнесе работает уже 5 лет. Помещение для бизнеса арендует. Системы отопления устанавливает, в основном, в организациях, теплицах, а также частных домах и офисах. Заказов — вполне хватает. 
Сумма в 6 000 гривен нужна Сергею для того, чтобы закупить электрооборудование, ультрафиолетовые лампы. Это достаточно популярный вид обогрева, так как это дешевле по сравнению с газовым отоплением. Сергей мечтает заработать денег на собственное жилье для своей семьи и трех детей.
texts.en:
Sergei installs and sells electric heating systems . He lives and works in the region of Drogobych, and has been in this business for the past five years.  He rents a retail space and mostly installs heating systems in organizations, greenhouses, private houses and offices.  He receives a sufficient number of orders.

Sergei needs 6,000 hryvnia to purchase electrical ultraviolet lamps.  This is a popular form of heating system which happens to be cheaper than gas.  Sergei's dream is to make more money for his family, for his three children, and to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase electric equipment sale

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: Maria de 38 años vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la variedad y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos del hogar, Maria está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para obtener mejores ganancias y así tener junto con su esposo una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria is 38 years old and lives with her husband in their own home.  She sells clothing out of her home and has many customers because of her good prices.  She helps her husband through her sales and together they are able to meet their household expenses.  Maria is asking for this loan to buy more clothing in quantity so she can improve her income and so she and her husband can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: El Profeta Group

texts.es: Este grupo está integrado por tres socias exitosos en sus labores diarios, coordinado por la señora Yamileth de 22 años de edad acompañada y madre de un hijo de 3 años, ofrece a los pobladores de su comunidad tortillas, frijoles cosidos y un ingreso extra es la venta de cosmético, tiene dos años de mantener este negocio y se ha propuesto aumentarlo, para esto necesita su apoyo, pues con el crédito invertirá en frijol, quintal de maíz y compra de productos como es vanidad, pinturas de labios, pinturas de uñas, delineador, rubor, etc. Otra de la socias es la señora Reyna de 20 años de edad comerciante de ropa de cama, ella lo vende por encargo y el señor Zelin de 25 años vendedor de pescado en el mercado de la localidad.
texts.en: This group is made up of three successful members.  Yamileth is 22 years old and serves as the group’s coordinator.  She is married, has three children, and sells tortillas, cooked beans, and cosmetics for an extra income.  She has had this business for two years and wants to expand it and needs your help.  She will use the money from this loan to buy beans, corn, and products such as lipstick, nail polish, liners, blush, etc.  Rayna, another member, sells night clothing to order and the gentleman, 25 year old Zelin, sells fish in the local market.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: La Fortune 2 (2) Group

texts.en:
Brunelle is a member of the community bank group La Fortune 2 (2) and leads a group of 11 other micro-entrepreneurs in Brazzaville, Republic of Congo. Brunelle supports her husband and two children through running a restaurant out of her home, and she needs this loan to help purchase additional supplies for her restaurant: fresh and dried fish, sugar and coal.

In the future, thanks to taking out loans with HOPE Congo, Brunelle would like to open a second restaurant and be able to purchase a piece of land to build her own home. She hopes that she’ll be able to eventually purchase a car so that her son can have a job as a taxi driver in Brazzaville.

loans.use: to purchase fresh and dried fish, sugar and coal for her restaurant

loans.name: Maysoon

texts.en:
Maysoon, 34, is divorced and has two children. She supports them by working at a private company. She also has a few chickens and sells them and their eggs from her home.

Maysoon is applying for a 1,037 JOD loan through National Microfinance Bank to add to her flock of chickens and so increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy more chickens.

loans.name: Ola

texts.en: Ola was born in 1981. She is single lady and lives with her parents and 4 siblings at a sector in Jordan called southern Ghour. She has worked as a photographer for 4 years at her brothers' studio. Then she became her brothers' partner at the studio. Ola would like to purchase more cameras and backgrounds so that she can do her work more professionally and attract more customers. She needs money to do this. For this reason, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: to purchase more cameras and backgrounds.

loans.name: Sana

texts.en: Sana is a conservative lady, so she asked her husband to take her place in the picture. Sana was born in 1976. She is a married woman and a mother of 2. Her husband has a bakery. Sana has been trying her best to support her husband in running his bakery for 6 years. Sana's husband currently can't repair his bakery, so she is now applying for a loan to help her husband repair and decorate it so that he will attract more customers.

loans.use: to help her husband repair his bakery and decorate it.

loans.name: Lubov

texts.ru:
Любовь 14 лет занимается торговлей на местном рынке в Новой Каховке. Она арендует землю у администрации рынка, бутик — в ее собственности. Любовь торгует искусственными цветами, букетами, композициями, икебанами. Она — очень креативная, умеет делать интересные вещи своими руками. Многое от выручки вкладывает в нужды своей семьи. 
Сумма в 8 000 гривен нужна ей для того, чтобы закупить цветочную продукцию в большом ассортименте к поминальным дням, которые в Украине соблюдаются через неделю праздника Пасхи. Это время, когда украинцы вспоминают умерших в своих семьях и в память о них украшают могилы родных на кладбищах искусственными цветами.
texts.en:
Lubov has been a vendor at a local market in Novaya Kahovka for the past 14 years.  She rents some space from the market's administration but has her own boutique where she sells artificial flowers, bouquets, floral compositions, ikebana...  She is a very creative woman, who is able to create beautiful things with her own hands.  She uses most of her earnings to take care of the needs of her family.

Lubov needs 8,000 hryvnia to buy a large assortment of floral goods for the Ukrainian Memorial Day, which is observed a week after the Easter Holiday.  This is the time of year when Ukrainian people remember their relatives who have died and honor their memories by adorning their graves with artificial flowers.

loans.use: to purchase new floral products for sale during the Ukrainian Memorial Day.

loans.name: Serieux Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe SERIEUX est constitué de sept femmes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 38 ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles  élargies dans le quartier  NIEBALA de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur deuxième prêt. Le précédent prêt a été correctement remboursé. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de  céréales et des savons traditionnels à l’image de SALI qui est la 3ème femme debout  dans la photo de la gauche vers la droite. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, 500 kg de maïs, 400 kg de mil, de la potasse et de l’huile pour fabriquer des savons traditionnels. Elle s’approvisionne auprès des grossistes de Bougouni. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle mixte . 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 28.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en: The Serieux Group is made up of seven married women who, on average, are 38 years old and have 4 children. They live in large traditional families in the Niebala quarter of the town of Bougouni. They know one another through neighborhood, friendship and business ties. To strengthen their financial capacity, in order to better run their business, they joined the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution, with which they are on their second loan. The previous loan was properly repaid. This group of women sells grain and traditional soaps, like Sali, who is the third woman standing in the photo from the left to the right. With her loan, she expects to buy 500 kilograms of corn, 400 kilograms of millet, and potash and oil for making traditional soap. She stocks up at the wholesalers of Bougouni. She makes her sales at the market and from her home, at retail, for cash and for credit to a mixed clientele. She expects to make an average monthly profit of 28,000 francs CFA which will be reinvested in her business and used to repay the loan.

loans.use: to purchase grains and the ingredients for soap-making.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and renovate her workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his daughter's school expenses.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Alma is 39 years old and has two children who are in school.

Alma has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional fishing materials and gear for her business.

Alma has been in this business for 17 years. In the future, Alma would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing materials and gear for her business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: A portion of Hussien's Group $ 3,000 loan is to purchase more goods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his daughter's education.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay for his son’s education.

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru: Дом, где живет Нигора, не отвечает стандартам жилья и она срочно должна отремонтировать свой дом. Она молодая и целеустремленная женщина. Нигора не замужем и живет с родителями. Нигора 2 года назад начала свой бизнес шитьем женской одежды. Она имеет свой швейный цех на местном рынке. Там много народа и поэтому она имеет постоянных клиентов. Нигора постепенно развевает свой бизнес. Она уже давно хочет отремонтировать свой дом, так как ее дом имеет плохое состояние. Она обратилась за займом с такой целью. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесина и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: The house where Nigora lives does not meet housing standards and is in urgent need of repair.  Nigora is a young and ambitious woman.  She is not married and she still lives with her parents.  Two years ago, she started her own business, sewing women's clothes.  She has her own sewing shop at the local market.  The market is a busy place: Nigora has regular customers and is gradually growing her business.  For a long time now, she has also wanted to repair her house, because it is in such poor condition.  This is why she is taking a loan.  She is requesting a loan of 3,000 somoni for the purchase of building materials such as cement, wood etc.  She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement, wood and sand to repair her house.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru: Насиба молодая жительница района Шахритус. Скоро ей исполнится 25 лет. Она уже замужем и имеет годовалого ребенка. Ее муж предоставляет услуги мастера по стройке и ремонту домов. А Насиба в течение 5 лет занимается растениеводством. Она обеспечивает семью не только доходом, но и экологически чистыми продуктами. Насиба выращивает овощи на небольшом участке земли. Сейчас она обратилась за кредитом для проведения очередного посева. Она полагается на финансовую поддержку, чтобы приобрести семена и минеральные удобрения.
texts.en: Nasiba is a young woman who lives in the Shahrituz district of Tajikistan.  She will soon be 25 years old.  She is already married and has a one-year-old child.  Her husband works as a house repairman and master builder on construction sites.  Nasiba herself has been involved in agriculture for the past five years.  She brings an income home and also provides her family with some environmentally-friendly produce.  She grows vegetables on a small plot of land and is requesting a loan to begin a new planting season.  She relies on this financial support to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Santa Lucia Group

texts.es:
El grupo Santa Lucia está en su ciclo 23 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 5 de las señoras  se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir que deben seguir luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Juliana, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que debe seguir esforzándose por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que se dedica a vender todo tipo de productos, como ser prendas varias y también bijouterie. Juliana está luchando para poder dar a su familia todo lo que ella no pudo tener, y de esa forma poder evitar que pasen por necesidades.
La Sra. Juliana solicita de este préstamo para la compra de ropas, zapatillas, bijouterie, etc., lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group Santa Lucia is in its 23rd loan cycle with the women's committee, where everyone works and helps each other to get ahead. They are doing the poverty elimination survey, where 5 of the women are below the poverty line; that is to say, they should continue fighting to improve their living conditions.

One of the members is Juliana, who in her last survey showed a poverty level within level one. What this means is that she should keep making an effort to improve her living conditions and those of her family through effort and continuous work. Regarding the work that she does, she sells all kinds of products, such as clothing and also costume jewelry. Juliana is also fighting to be able to give her family everything that she was not able to have, and in this way, be able to avoid their being in need. Juliana is requesting this loan for the purchase of clothing, shoes, costume jewelry, etc., which will help her business plan to take shape, helping her to improve her earnings.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, shoes, costume jewelry, etc. for sale.

loans.name: Oñondivepa Group

texts.es:
El grupo Oñondivepa  está en su ciclo número 1º  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, que les permitirá conocer la situación de cada una y conforme a ello poder trabajar.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Bernarda, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que es  ama de casa y se dedica a la costura para mejorar su nivel de pobreza y de esa forma poder dar a su familia todo lo que ella no pudo tener.
Bernarda es una mujer muy sacrificada y luchadora, pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas, hilos, gomas, cierres y demás productos, para que de esa forma pueda seguir luchando por mejorar su vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
The Oñondivepa group is in the first circle of the Fundación Paraguaya program. This committee of women all work and help one another to move forward. They are participating in a survey of poverty elimination so they are all familiar with one another's situation and are able to work.

One of the group members is Señora Bernarda, whose latest survey indicated that she was at a stage two poverty level. Beyond her work as a housewife, she makes a living through her needlework. She does this to improve her standard of living and to be able to give her family everything that she could not have. 

Bernarda is a very hardworking woman who has sacrificed a lot. She is requesting this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of fabrics, threads, glue, zippers, and other products. With this investment, she can continue fighting to improve her life and the lives of her family members.

loans.use: to buy fabric, threads, glue, zippers, and other products

loans.name: Martha Del Socorro

texts.es: Martha es una mujer que se dedica al cuidado de su familia y de su pequeño negocio que es el sustento de la misma. Con los deseos de superación y de sacar a sus hijos adelante, obtuvo la gran idea de emprender su propio negocio, el cual consta en el alquiler de computadoras a toda aquella persona que necesite comunicarse a una gran distancia por video-llamadas o envió de correos electrónicos. Su próxima meta es la adquisición de nuevas computadoras la obtener mayores ganancias.  Ella solicita un financiamiento para darle mantenimiento a todas sus computadoras que presenta en su negocio y de esta forma brindarle un mejor servicio a toda su clientela. Sus planes a futuros es convertirse en una cadena de ciberes de alta calidad de servicio técnico.
texts.en:
Martha is a woman who dedicates her time to caring for her family and looking after her small business.  This business provides the income for her family.  With a strong will to overcome any difficulties and to raise her children well, she had the great idea of starting up her own business.  She has an internet café where people can use her computers to when they need to make video calls or send emails.  

Her next goal is to buy new computers to increase her profits.  She is asking for a loan to service the computers she has and therefore, be able to offer a better service to her customers.  In the future she would like to open a chain of cybercafés with a high level of technical service.

loans.use: to service all the computers she has in her business.

loans.name: Un Nuevo Amanecer Group

texts.es:
Cada una de las integrantes de este grupo trabajan con la intención de generar sus propios ingresos, y por medio de ellos poder ayudar a sus familias. Se destaca el trabajo en equipo entre ellas organizan actividades en donde se ayudan entre todas para el bien del grupo.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Evarista quien a través del trabajo y deseo de superación se esmera en trabajar para lograr sus objetivos en su trabajo de costurera y elaboración de prendas para lograr mayor producción y mejor ganancia, ella demuestra interés y dedicación a su trabajo para poder solventar los gastos de la casa y con  el compromiso que tiene con su grupo.
La Sra. Evarista  solicita de este préstamo para la compra de telas, hilos, botones, cierres y demás insumos, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos y para el progreso de cada una de ellas.
texts.en:
Each of the members of this group works with the intention of generating their own income, and helping their families with it. That are very good at working as a group; they organize activities where they help each other for the good of the group. 

One of the members is Evarista, who through her work and her desire to get ahead takes pains to work hard to achieve her goals in her work as a seamstress who makes clothing in order to achieve more production and improved earnings. She shows interest in and dedication to her work so she can pay for her household's expenses and the obligation she has to her group.

Evarista is requesting this loan in order to buy fabrics, threads, buttons, zippers, and other items. These will help her improve her income and help each one of them [the group members] advance.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, threads, buttons, zippers, and other items.

loans.name: Kuña Mbarete Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado “Kuña Mbarete”  está en su 5º ciclo  del programa de comité de Mujeres, donde todas se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse entre todas para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de cada una.
Nimia es una mujer muy sacrificada, que se dedica al reciclaje de productos varios, como ser cartones, aluminio, papel y plástico, que ella recoge y que luego vende al por mayor, y es por medio de este trabajo que ayuda a su familia. Nimia comenta que está orgullosa con el trabajo que hace ya que es un trabajo digno y por sobre todo honesto.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de materiales reciclados, como ser plásticos, aluminio y demás, que ella compra y luego vende al por mayor para tener un mejor ingreso. Agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
The women´s group “Kuña Mbarete” is in its fifth cycle and all its members are committed to working hard and helping each other to get on in life. They are taking the poverty elimination survey in order to improve the quality of life of each member.

Nimia recycles a wide range of products such as boxes, aluminum, paper and plastic, which she collects and then sells wholesale.  She does this job with a lot of sacrifice but it helps her to support her family.  She is very proud of the work that she does because it is a dignified and above all an honest job.

She is asking for this loan to invest in recycled materials, such as plastic, aluminum and other things.  She buys them and later sells them wholesale to increase her income.  She is grateful for the help that she is receiving.

loans.use: to buy recycled materials such as plastic, aluminium and others wholesale to later re-sell.

loans.name: Chamanpi Sartasiñani Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CHAMANPI SATASIÑANI” iniciará el octavo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de German Busch, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Nelfy es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tienda de barrio, venta de dulces, tienda de abarrotes, venta de peluches, venta de comida, salón de belleza, taller de costura.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Nelfy es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de su hermana que es socia en la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de  venta de dulces; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su familia que comercializan los mismos productos, pasado el tiempo decide emprender un negocio independiente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de dulces por mayor) que adquirirá de la frontera Bolivia - Perú y posteriormente lo comercializará a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyarse porque ella estudia y necesita apoyo económico.
 
Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la unión de sus compañeras de la Banca Comunal.
texts.en:
